Uses of Interface
io.fluxzero.common.application.PropertySource

Packages that use PropertySource
Package
Description
io.fluxzero.common.application
 

  • Uses of PropertySource in io.fluxzero.common.application

    Classes in io.fluxzero.common.application that implement PropertySource
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    ApplicationEnvironmentPropertiesSource
    A PropertySource that loads environment-specific properties from an application-<env>.properties file on the classpath.
    class 
    ApplicationPropertiesSource
    A PropertySource implementation that loads properties from an application.properties file located on the classpath.
    class 
    DecryptingPropertySource
    A PropertySource decorator that transparently decrypts encrypted property values.
    class 
    DefaultPropertySource
    A layered PropertySource implementation used as the default source for resolving application properties in a Fluxzero application.
    enum 
    EnvironmentVariablesSource
    A PropertySource that resolves property values from system environment variables.
    class 
    JavaPropertiesSource
    Base class for PropertySource implementations backed by a Properties object.
    enum 
    NoOpPropertySource
    A no-operation PropertySource implementation that never returns any property values.
    class 
    SimplePropertySource
    A simple in-memory implementation of the PropertySource interface backed by a Map.
    class 
    SystemPropertiesSource
    A PropertySource implementation that reads configuration properties from the JVM system properties.
    Methods in io.fluxzero.common.application that return PropertySource
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    default PropertySource
    PropertySource.andThen(PropertySource next)
    Combines this property source with another, returning the first non-null value found between the two.
    static PropertySource
    PropertySource.join(PropertySource... propertySources)
    Joins multiple PropertySource instances into a single one.

    Description

    Combines this property source with another, returning the first non-null value found between the two.

    Constructors in io.fluxzero.common.application with parameters of type PropertySource
    Modifier
    Constructor
    Description
     
    DecryptingPropertySource(PropertySource delegate)
    Constructs a DecryptingPropertySource using a delegate and automatically resolves the encryption key from system or environment variables.
     
    DecryptingPropertySource(PropertySource delegate, Encryption encryption)
    Constructs a DecryptingPropertySource using an explicit Encryption strategy.
     
    DecryptingPropertySource(PropertySource delegate, String encryptionKey)
    Constructs a DecryptingPropertySource using the given encryption key.
